overview: A Software Engineer (Java Developer), a blogger and a SEO Expert. I am a very simple person and like to meet new people. I love to surf the net for technology news, electronic gadgets and other informative stuff. I am a huge Cricket fan and a music lover. I love to listen to Hindi songs sung by my favorite singers. I am very fond of statistics also, be it cricket statistics or of something else. I believe in living and letting other live.
